ResearchProjectDef.label: Flowers
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to discover new beautiful, genetic complicated flowers. \n\n Unlocks Blossom Vine, Loverium, God Hearth

ResearchProjectDef.label: Trees
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to plant more trees \n\n Unlocks Mahogany Tree, Baobab, Sequoia, Stick-Tree

ResearchProjectDef.label: Fexi Wood
ResearchProjectDef.description:
Allows you discover "Flexi Wood" - a special hard, but flexible wood which can be gathered from special trees. 

 Unlocks Flexi Wood 

 Unlocks Curvy Tree

ResearchProjectDef.label: Dimen Wood
ResearchProjectDef.description:
Allows you discover "Dimen Wood" - a special wood which can be stronger than metal or plasteel! It can be gathered from special, hard in grow trees. 

 Unlocks Nano Wood 

 Unlocks Dimension Tree
